description.en: The heartwarming story of two different girls brought together over a cat, as they learn about each other, spend time together, and heal one another.
description.es-la: Una conmovedora historia de dos chicas, diferente una de la otra, que se conocen por un encuentro con un gato y desde entonces han estado acompañándose y consolándose .

description.en:
"Proud Carter, it's all thanks to you my life has been ruined!" Rita, a lady of a noble, became a bar waitress with limited lifespan because of him. There are many days when she wants revenge, but doesn't have a blade to hold on to. 

One day, A foreign shaman suggested to Rita, "I will exchange your old body for a new one.", with the shaman's magic, Rita, the Countess's daughter, was able to be reborn as Bertha Alberthart.

---
- [Original Webtoon R15 version <RidiBooks>](https://ridibooks.com/books/1716001591)

My vision and my heart were completely taken over by "N."

The case of five missing junior high school boys. The massacre of an entire elementary school class. A car crash resulting in the deaths of two people. The letter "N" was left at each of these crime scenes.

An urban legend circulates, suggesting the main culprit is "N," a religious group thought to have collapsed 2,000 years ago.

What exactly is "N"?

title.en: Ani no Yome to Kurashite Imasu.

altTitles.th: เมื่อรักของฉันและเธอเริ่มผลิบาน

altTitles.ja: 兄の嫁と暮らしています。

description.de: Seit dem Tod ihres Bruders, lebt die 17-jährige Shino Kishibe mit der Witwe Ehefrau ihres Bruders, Nozomi. Nozomi möchte ein Person sein, an die sich Shino anlehnen kann, während Shino entschlossen dazu ist, ihr keine Bürde zu sein. Zusammen versuchen die verwaiste Oberschülerin und die junge Witwe sich gegenseitig zu unterstützen, während ihre Leben normal weitergehen.
description.en:
Since the death of her brother, seventeen year-old Shino Kishibe has been living with her sister-in-law Nozomi. Nozomi wants to be a person Shino can lean on, while Shino is determined not to be a burden. Together the orphaned high-schooler and young widow try to support one another while carrying on with their everyday lives.  
  


---
description.fr: Après la mort de son frère, Shino Kishibe doit vivre avec sa belle-soeur, Nozomi. Ensemble, elles apprendront à communiquer, à se faire confiance mutuellement et surtout à faire le deuil.
description.id: Shino Kishibe, seorang gadis yatim piatu tinggal bersama Kakak iparnya, Nozomi, semenjak Kakak kandungnya meninggal. Shino dan Nozomi menjalani hari-harinya dengan saling menguatkan satu sama lain.
description.ko: 키시베 시노, 고교생. 17세. 부모님이 돌아가신 뒤 유일한 가족이었던 오빠도 6개월 전 세상을 떠났습니다. 지금 저는 '오빠의 아내'인 '노조미 씨'와 살고 있습니다. 「타인이지만 가족」. 그런 두 사람의 조금은 불가사의하고, 서투르고, 조금은 행복을 깨닫게 하는 일상 감성 스토리.
description.ru: "Мои родители умерли давным-давно: погибли в автокатастрофе. После этого мы с братом жили вдвоем, до тех пор пока он…"

altTitles.ja: 伝説の男の娘もっこり配信者

description.en:
A femboy shows off his bulge on a livestream!!

However, it gets even more popular than he expected?!

---

* Alternative Official Raw - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mukunozaltusou/status/1844651030761685297)
description.id: Seorang cowok cantik mencoba mengolok-olok penonton om-om dengan Steaming sambil cross-dressing dan memamerkan tubuh montoknya!! Namun, tidak disangka dia mendapatkan popularitas karena hal lain...!?
description.ja:
配信でもっこりを見せつける男の娘‼

しかし、それが以外にも人気が出てしまい…⁉

title.en: Kao dake yoi Classmate ga Yatara to Guigui Kuru Yuri no Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 顔だけ良いクラスメイトがやたらとグイグイ来る百合の話

altTitles.en: A Yuri Story About How My Classmate Whose Only Good Trait Is Her Excessively Pretty Face Comes at Me Relentlessly

title.en: Herami Shimai wa Docchi mo Yanderu

altTitles.ja: 平良深姉妹はどっちもヤんでる

altTitles.en: The Yandere Little Sister and the Menhera Big Sister

altTitles.es-la: La hermana pequeña Yandere y la hermana mayor Menhera

altTitles.zh: 平良深姐妹都“病”得不轻

altTitles.vi: Hai chị em nhà Herami bất ổn thực sự!

description.en: Sera, (Real Name: Herami Sera) is an approval-seeking girl (26 years old) who works at a maid cafe. Her younger sister, Kira, is an idol (19 years old) who is rapidly gaining popularity with her cool, and mature character. However, the real Kira only ever thinks of her sister and tries to cheer her up in every possible way to help her sister with her mental health and anxiety.
description.ja: せーら（本名：平良深 瀬良）はメイドカフェで働く承認欲求高めな女子（26歳）。そんな彼女の妹・キラは、クールな大人っぽいキャラで人気沸騰中のアイドル（19歳）。しかし、素顔のキラはいつも姉のことしか考えておらず、不安を抱える姉のため、あらゆる手段で励まそうとしていて…。
description.es-la: Sera, (Nombre real: Herami Sera) es una chica que busca aprobación (26 años) que trabaja en un maid café. Su hermana menor, Kira, es una ídolo (19 años) que está ganando popularidad rápidamente con su carácter frío y maduro. Sin embargo, la verdadera Kira solo piensa en su hermana y trata de animarla de todas las maneras posibles para ayudar a su hermana con su salud mental y ansiedad.

title.en: Sono Munou, Jitsu wa Sekai Saikyou no Mahoutsukai ~Munou to Sagesumare, Kizokuka kara Oidasareta ga, Gift "Tenseisha" ga Kakusei shite Zense no Nouryoku ga Yomigaetta~

altTitles.ja: その無能、実は世界最強の魔法使い　〜無能と蔑まれ、貴族家から追い出されたが、ギフト《転生者》が覚醒して前世の能力が蘇った〜

altTitles.en: That Incompetent is Actually the World's Strongest Wizard: He was Scorned as Incompetent and Kicked out of His Aristocratic Family, but His Gift of "Reincarnation" Awakened and Brought Back the Abilities of His Previous Life

description.en:
Alma, the third son of an aristocratic family who could not receive the Gift that should have been given by God, is despised as incompetent from his parents' home and is expelled from the house. However, in reality, Alma was given a special Gift - He regained the abilities of the previous life! With the Gift [Reincarnation], he becomes the strongest wizard in the world! Alma, who devoted all of his first life to the quest for magic, seeks a "happy second life" with the magic of his previous life!
___
[Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3823gm/)  (JP)
description.ja: この世界の人々は15歳になると、女神様から《ギフト》と呼ばれる様々な能力を与えられる。貴族家の三男・アルマも優秀な《ギフト》を授かることを期待されていたが、なぜか《ギフト》はまったく発現せず、実家から無能と蔑まれ追い出されてしまう…。だが、実はアルマは特別な《ギフト》を授かっていたーー。その能力《転生者》によって前世の記憶と能力を取り戻したアルマは、この世界で最強の魔法使いとなった！一度目の人生の全てを魔法の探究に捧げたアルマが、前世で極めた魔法で”幸せな二度目の人生”へと歩み出す！

title.en: My New Girlfriend Is Not Human?

altTitles.de: Meine neue Freundin ist kein Mensch?

altTitles.fr: Ma Nouvelle Copine N'est Pas Humaine ?

altTitles.pt-br: Minha nova namorada não é humana?

altTitles.tr: Yeni kız arkadaşım insan değil mi?

title.en: Watashi to Kanojo no Kawaii Koi no Hajime Kata

altTitles.en: How My Cute Girlfriend and I Started a Love Story

altTitles.ja: 私と彼女のかわいい恋のはじめ方

title.en: Outaishi-sama, Watashi Kondo Koso Anata ni Korosaretakunain desu!

altTitles.ja: 王太子様、私今度こそあなたに殺されたくないんです〜聖女に嵌められた貧乏令嬢、二度目は串刺し回避します！〜

altTitles.en: You Won't Kill Me This Time, Crown Prince!

altTitles.zh-hk: 王太子大人，这次我绝不想被你杀掉！

description.en: The poverty-stricken noblewoman, Liesel, was murdered by her lover, the crown prince, in an elaborate ruse set up by the evil saintess. However, she receives a second chance to live as she suddenly wakes up as her childhood self. She takes this event as a chance to change her life, and live without ties to both the crown prince and the saintess, but by a strange twist of fate, she becomes entangled with the saintess's childhood friend! A woman with a strong will to live who has been ensnared by fateーLiesel's success story begins here!

altTitles.ja: 最果てに惑う

altTitles.es-la: Perdido en los extremos más bajos

description.en: After his little sister was raped and killed herself, a teenage boy took revenge and killed her rapist in return. Seven years later the boy's released from prison, determined to kill himself due to insufferable guilt but then he's confronted by the rapist's daughter. A dramatic tale of guilt and atonement.
description.ru:
«Семь лет назад я убил человека».

Расправившись с преступником, который довёл его сестру, Юри, до самоубийства, Кадзума был приговорён к семи годам тюремного заключения. Даже после выхода на свободу его преследуют мысли о совершённом убийстве и о девочке, наблюдавшей за происходящим. Терзаемый чувством вины, Кадзума принимает решение искупить свои грехи собственной смертью. Вместе со своей матерью он навещает могилу Юри, где замечает знакомое лицо девочки...

Это история о несчастной судьбе дочери преступника-потерпевшего.
description.es-la:
Después de que su hermana pequeña Yuri fuera violada y debido a esto se suicidara, su hermano Kazuma decide tomar venganza y matar a su violador. 

7 años después, él sale de prisión, decidido a suicidarse debido a una culpa insoportable y para estar paz con su hermana, pero luego accidentalmente conoce a Shiika, la hija del violador de su hermana. Una historia dramática de culpa y expiación.

altTitles.ja: ドラゴンボール超

description.en:
Dragon Ball Super follows the aftermath of Goku's fierce battle with Majin Buu, as he attempts to maintain earth's fragile peace.

Having defeated Majin Buu, Goku is starting to get bored with his life on Earth. His wife, Chi-chi, wants him to get a job, but all he wants to do is train and fight stronger enemies. Elsewhere in the universe, the God of Destruction, Beerus, and his attendant Whis are traveling from planet to planet in search of food and entertainment. 

After blowing up some hapless victims, Beerus is reminded of a man from his dreams with the moniker “Super Saiyan God,” or something like that... The God of Destruction sets his sights on Earth to track down this mysterious man! Maybe this will give Goku something to do?
description.pt-br: Dragon Ball Super segue as consequências da batalha feroz de Goku com Majin Buu, enquanto ele tenta manter a frágil paz da Terra.

altTitles.ja: TS衛生兵さんの戦場日記

altTitles.pt-br: Diário de Guerra da Enfermeira Transgênero

description.en:
An ex-pro gamer of the FPS genre (♂) reincarnated in a fantasy world filled with magic... Only to learn that what greeted him was not a scene from one's dreams, but a muddy battlefield full of bullets flying to and fro! Moreover, he's now an orphan girl named Touri Noel?!

After her aptitude for healing magic was discovered, she decided to volunteer in the army as a second-class medic, all to raise money for the orphanage where she was born and raised. However, without even getting magic training, she was attached to an assault squad, repeatedly fighting on the most cruel battlefields of the "Western Front."
The mission given to her was to become the personal medic of the frontline's ace, Garback, and not let him die at any cost. But he turned out to be the worst commander, who will try to get results whatever the cost, even if it means the death of his subordinates!

On the battlefield, mired in unreasonable orders and violence, Touri's fierce battle for survival continues...
description.ja:
FPSの元プロゲーマー♂が転生した世界は魔法が存在するファンタジー世界だった――が、そこには夢広がる冒険はなく、銃弾が飛び交う泥沼の戦場が待っていた！　しかも、トウリ・ノエルという名の孤児の「少女」として……!?

トウリは回復魔法への適性を見出され、生まれ育った孤児院への資金援助のため軍に志願し二等衛生兵となる。しかし魔法の訓練も受けないまま、彼女は最も過酷な戦闘が繰り広げられている「西部戦線」の突撃部隊へと配属されてしまう。
彼女に与えられた任務は戦線のエースであるガーバックの専属衛生兵となり、絶対に彼を死なせないこと。けれどガーバックは部下を見殺しにしてでも戦果を上げる最低の指揮官でもあった！

理不尽な命令と暴力が飛び交う戦場で、トウリはただ生き残るために奮闘するが――。

altTitles.ja: やぎさん郵便

description.en: University student Hirose Kiyotaka finds a love letter tucked into the pages of a borrowed book. While attempting to return the letter, he encounters the charismatic Hanashiro Seiji and quickly becomes involved with him. As their tentative relationship develops, however, he finds himself wondering how serious Hanashiro's feelings for him really are. Meanwhile, the letter falls into the hands of Hanashiro's colleague Sawa Jinichiro, who entraps its writer, Arihara Mineo. Sawa's actions are seemingly ruthless, but his true motives regarding Arihara are far from clear.

altTitles.ja: 僕のカノジョ先生

altTitles.vi: Bạn gái tôi là cô giáo

description.en:
Can sensei be the heroine? Please?  
  
Due to a traumatic experience, I have a distrust of people called "sensei". I, Saiki Makoto, was called by after school by the most popular and beautiful teacher at my school, Fujiki Maka-sensei. "I... love you" Eh– a confession out of the blue!? "Until you say you love me, I will continue to pursue you." Ever since then, I've been called by for "guidance counselling" after school, somehow watched AV together, being given excessive skin-ship, went on dates together. Over time, I gradually became conscious of Sensei...? But isn't it bad for Sensei to go out with her student? Lesson start!
description.ja: 過去のトラウマが原因で“先生”と呼ばれる人が嫌いな彩木慎は、校内一の美人教師・藤城真香に呼び出される。二人きりの生徒指導室、神妙な面持ちの先生が発したのは「わたしは、君が好きです」まさかの告白で…!?
description.pt-br: Devido a uma experiência traumática, eu nunca mais confiei em pessoas com o título de “professor”. Certo dia eu, Saigi Makoto, fui chamado depois da aula pela professora mais bela de toda a escola, Fujiki Maka-sensei, para de repente ela se confessar do nada e falar que continuará me perseguindo até eu disser que sim!

altTitles.ja: 怪獣8号

description.en:
A man working a job far removed from his childhood dreams gets wrapped up in an unexpected situation…! Becoming a monster, he aims once again to fulfill his lifelong dream…!

---
Kafka hopes to one day keep his pact with his childhood friend Mina to join the Japan Defense Force and fight by her side. But while she’s out neutralizing kaiju as Third Division captain, Kafka is stuck cleaning up the aftermath of her battles. When a sudden rule change makes Kafka eligible for the Defense Force, he decides to try out for the squad once more. There’s just one problem. He’s made the Defense Force’s neutralization list under the code name Kaiju No. 8.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Viz](https://www.viz.com/kaiju-no-8)
description.es:
Japón tiene la mayor tasa de incidencias por ataques de Kaijus de todo el mundo. Los Kaijus irrumpen continuamente y sin piedad en las vidas cotidianas de la gente. Kafka Hibino, que siempre quiso ser un miembro de las Fuerzas de Defensa, actualmente trabaja como limpiador de cadáveres de Kaijus.
Sin embargo, un día, una misteriosa criatura convierte a Kafka en un Kaiju, y las Fuerzas de Defensa de Japón, encargados de derrotar a estos monstruos, le identificaron con el nombre clave de “Kaiju N.8”.
description.fr:
Enfant, Kafka Hibino rêvait d’intégrer les Forces de Défense pour combattre ces terribles ennemis, mais après de nombreux échecs à l’examen d’entrée, ce trentenaire travaille à nettoyer les rues de leurs encombrants cadavres. Jusqu’au jour où une mystérieuse créature s’introduit dans son organisme et le métamorphose en une entité surpuissante mi-humaine, mi-kaiju. Son nouveau nom de code : “Kaiju n° 8” !

Maison d'édition FR : Kazé / Crunchyroll
description.it:
Un uomo, infelice del lavoro che deve fare per il resto della sua vita, rimane coinvolto in un evento inaspettato…!  
Si è trasformato in un kaiju, una creatura mostruosa, che gli darà un'altra opportunità per raggiungere ciò che ha sempre sognato!
description.ja: 怪獣発生率が世界屈指の日本。この国は、容赦なく怪獣が日常を侵していた。かつて防衛隊員を目指していたが、今は怪獣専門清掃業で働く日比野カフカ。ある日カフカは、謎の生物によって、身体が怪獣化、怪獣討伐を担う日本防衛隊からコードネーム「怪獣8号」と呼ばれる存在になる。
description.ru: Некоторые люди проживают серую жизнь, так и не пережив ничего захватывающего. Но нашему герою вроде бы повезло: хоть он и был недоволен работой, которой ему пришлось заниматься, случается кое-что неожиданное. Он превращается в кайдзю — чудовищное существо, и теперь получает шанс не просто изменить свою жизнь, а достичь всего, о чём он когда-либо мечтал!
description.tr: Yapmak zorunda olduğu işinde pek de memnun olmayan bir adam beklenmedik olaylara karışır..! Bir Kaiju'ya, dehşet verici korkunç, muazzam bir yaratığa dönüşür. Peki ya bu, uzun zamandır hayal ettiği şeylere sonunda kavuşabileceği fırsatıysa..?.
description.pt-br: Um homem, descontente com o trabalho que teve na vida, está envolvido em um evento inesperado...! Ele se torna um Kaijuu, uma criatura monstruosa, dando-lhe uma nova chance de alcançar o que ele sempre sonhou!

altTitles.ja: マダラランブル

description.en:
In modern Japan, where "vampires" that mimic humans and prey on them run rampant, there are girls who secretly fight these creatures, armed with silver weapons! Among the vampire exterminators is a team known as the "Madara-sou," a unit notorious for being full of "troublemakers." Newly assigned to this group is Reo, a girl with a certain secret. There, she encounters Kaika Kiriya, a woman who's particularly "dangerous," even among the eccentric residents of Madara-sou.

A thrilling, over-the-top, and occasionally heartwarming tale of friendship. Hunt, hunt, hunt! A girly vampire action story!
description.ja: 人に擬態し、人を喰う「吸血鬼」が跋扈する現代日本。ヤツらを狩るため、銀武器片手に人知れず戦う少女たちがいた！駆除業者の中でも問題児が集まった部隊・即応六班――通称「まだら荘」。吸血鬼を引き寄せる「ごちそう」体質を持ち、人を遠ざけ生きてきた昴 玲央がそこで出会ったのは、まだら荘の中でも一際美しく一際ヤバイ女・紀里谷 開花でーー。

altTitles.en: Don't Mess With the Film Club!

altTitles.ja: 映像研には手を出すな！

altTitles.ja-ro: Eizouken ni wa Te wo Dasu na!

description.en:
Asakusa Midori wants to create an anime, but she's too disheartened to make that first step by herself. But by pure chance, she meets Mizusaki Tsubame, an up-and-coming socialite secretly dreaming of becoming an animator. Together with Midori's money-loving best friend Kanamori Sayaka, the energetic trio slowly work towards making their "ultimate world" a reality!  
  


---

  
**Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/Eizouken_anime)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka's Twitter](https://twitter.com/dennou319)  
- [Mangaka's YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIhPflgXxYM9dsOzaI0sYgA)  
- [Official Anime (JP)](http://eizouken-anime.com/)  
- [Official Live-Action (JP)](https://eizouken-saikyo.com/)

title.en: Moshimo, Yuurei ga Hatsukoi o Shitara.

altTitles.en: If a Ghost Fell in Love for the First Time

altTitles.id: Jika Hantu Jatuh Cinta untuk Pertama Kalinya

description.id:
Aku Souta. Tidak punya pengalaman cinta, disebut sebagai otaku introvert dan siswa SMA… atau lebih tepatnya, dulu.
Hah? Kamu tanya apakah aku sudah lulus dari status virgin dan menjadi anak yang lebih keren?
Bukan, bukan. Aku bukan lagi seorang siswa SMA――aku sudah menjadi hantu.
Dengan kata lain, aku berubah menjadi mantan manusia yang introvert, otaku, dan virgn.
Aku hampir tidak punya ingatan ketika aku masih hidup, hanya satu hal yang masih aku ingat— yaitu aku masih virgin.
Mungkin itu adalah penyesalanku.
Dan entah bagaimana, aku tidak bisa keluar dari sekolah khusus cewek ini, jadi semacam arwah gentayangan yang terikat di sma putri ini, dan itu sungguh menyebalkan.
Tapi, meski saat hidup aku terlalu takut untuk bicara dengan cewek, sebagai hantu aku bisa bebas melihat mereka dalam segala situasi!
Aku mungkin merasa sedikit bersalah, tapi jadi hantu ternyata tidak buruk juga! Begitulah pikirku.
Hingga suatu hari, aku melihat boneka karakter favoritku terjatuh di sekolah. Saat mencoba mengambilnya――
“Kenapa ada cowok… di sekolah cewek ini…?”
Cantik, baik hati, populer dengan semua orang, dan entah bagaimana satu-satunya orang yang bisa melihatku walaupun aku adalah hantu dan benar-benar peduli padaku――
Aku jatuh cinta pada seorang gadis yang sama sekali tidak selevel denganku.

altTitles.ja: セブンゴースト

altTitles.th: เซเว่นโกสต์

description.en: Teased unmercifully for his past as an orphan and a slave, Teito has only his best friend Mikage to ease his days at the elite Barsburg Academy - and his mastery of the magical art of Zaiphon! But even that will not be enough to save him when he discovers a horrifying secret behind the ruling Empire. Trapped in an ancient battle between a wicked Death God and the Seven Ghosts and guided by three mysterious priests, Teito discovers a power that could save the world… and shed light on his own mysterious past.
description.ru:
Мир, похожий на наш. Тейто Кляйн - студент Священной военной академии Барсбургской Империи, чьи воспоминания до определенного времени попросту исчезли. О нем известно лишь то, что он был рабом из павшего королевства Раггс, а попасть в элитную школу ему удалось лишь благодаря владению "зайфоном" - энергией этого мира. Так, воспоминания, некогда оставившие Тейто, начали постепенно пробиваться в его снах, и после пропускного экзамена они вновь застают мальчишку не в самое выгодное время. Благодаря им Тейто вспоминает, что сильнейший из элитных военных главнокомандующий Аянами был тем, кто некогда убил его отца. Это воспоминание приводит Тейто к череде необычных событий, которые вскоре определяют его роль в истории. А выжить ему помогает Барсбургская церковь и три священника Фрау, Кастор и Лабрадор.

- [Wikipedia](https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/07-Ghost)

title.en: We are the Main Characters of the Demon World!

altTitles.ja: 魔界の主役は我々だ！

altTitles.ja-ro: Makai no Shuuyaku wa Wareware da!

description.en:
Shaoron Teufel is an ambitious demon who has enrolled in the demon school known as Babyls, aiming to become popular and join the Student Council. However, a number of trials await him as soon as he arrives! Being recruited by a shady division, summoning a familiar, participating in a flying test… Will Shaoron be able to stand out even more than the special student, Iruma-kun?   
  
A collaboration between *Mairimashita! Iruma-kun* and a popular Japanese YouTube channel, *We are the Main Characters of ◯◯!*  

- [We are the Main Characters of ◯◯! channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIZzHNbzlIskx3TxGznRyYg)
description.ru:
Коллаб между автором тайтла Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун! и Warewareda

Тойфер Сяорон - вечный мечтатель, поступив в демоническую школу Бабирус, стремится вступить в состав Студенческого Совета, не ища легких путей, решив доказать свою полезность тем самым вынудив президента студ.совета Амели самой прийти вербовать его, но что то пошло не так... Хитростью заманенный в батор по захвату и контролю школы Сяорон пытается выжить и не умереть на безжалостных заданиях!

title.en: I Became a Top Actor Just by Reading Books!

altTitles.vi: Trở thành diễn viên hàng đầu nhờ vào việc đọc sách

description.en:
Due to his lack of talent, Seonghyeon gave up acting and became a writer. Seonghyeon is a genius author with a natural talent for screenplays, but he still misses acting. Then one day, he got into a truck accident on set.

“If I’m born again, I have to act,” he promised and closed his eyes.

Seonghyeon returns 13 years back into the past to when he was 24 years old. And the method acting ability that goes into his scripts became the character itself! Okay, this life is about being reborn as a genius actor!

altTitles.ja: コハエースＥＸ

description.en:
A Holy Grail War has broken out in Koha-Ace!

After managing to avoid getting axed again and again, some miracle has allowed for a third volume of Koha-Ace! The mysterious new Servant designed by Takashi Takeuchi, Sakura Saber, is a storm of romance who will play an active role! We'll show you the real power of Koha-Ace. (Third Volume of Koha-Ace, following Koha-Ace+)

altTitles.ja: 瞬きの音

description.en: The young boy “I” becomes swallowed up by the pleasure of drawing and completing a painting, embarking on a long creative journey. Along the way, he must confront “you” who lies in the shadows. What is the true nature of “I,” that weaves between impulse and imagination?
description.ja:
なぜ今、“きみ”を描くのか—？
『血の轍』の押見修造、最新作！！

描くこと、描き切ることの快感に否応なく呑み込まれた少年の“ぼく“は、長い創作の旅に出た。
その旅路の影にいた、”きみ”と対峙を試みる。
虚無と衝動の狭間で紡がれる、“ぼく”の本性とは...？

altTitles.en: Isshiki-san Wants to Know About Love.

altTitles.ja-ro: Koutetsu no Rinna wa XX Saretai.

altTitles.ja: 一式さんは恋を知りたい。
鋼鉄のリンナは××されたい

altTitles.zh-hk: 一式小姐想要知曉戀愛。

altTitles.zh-ro: Gāngtiě zhí nǚ xiǎng bèi xx
Yīshì xiǎojiě xiǎng yào zhīxiǎo liàn'ài.
Gāngtiě de lín nà xiǎng bèi xx

altTitles.vi: Isshiki-san muốn biết yêu là gì

description.en:
A maiden who doesn't know what love is tries her hand at dating as a pseudo-couple!

Inspector Rinna, who is respected by everyone as a hard-working and serious policewoman, seems to be having trouble with her work lately. The reason for this is because she loses focus. It only happens when Meishi, the detective she works with, is around… So, she makes a choice…?
description.ja:
堅物で真面目な警察官だと周りから尊敬されている一式警部は、最近どうも仕事がうまくいかないご様子。
その原因は一緒に仕事をしている探偵・六反田がいる時にばかり起こってしまう…。
とあることから悩みの原因が判明した彼女は、問題を解決すべく六反田探偵と擬似カップルとして付き合うことになったが…？
恋を知らない乙女が擬似カップルとしてお付き合いに大挑戦な、ラブコメディ！

※2話目まで旧タイトル「鋼鉄のリンナは××されたい」表記となります。
description.pt-br:
Uma donzela que não sabe o que é o amor, experimenta o namoro como um pseudo-casal!

A inspectora Rinna, que é respeitada por todos como uma agente policial trabalhadora e séria, parece estar a ter problemas com o seu trabalho ultimamente. A razão para isto é porque ela perde o foco. Isto só acontece quando Meishi, o detective com quem ela trabalha, está por perto. Então, ela faz uma escolha…?

altTitles.ja: 救済の教室

description.en:
Makoto Noda, a run-of-the-mill Japanese teacher, endures ridicule from his students while struggling to manage a classroom on the verge of collapse. 

On a fateful day, a misunderstanding leads to a slap from a PE teacher, causing him to hit his head on the corner of a desk and lose consciousness. When he awakens, he finds himself facing a mysterious window. As he completes them, his real-life stats improve and he also acquires special items...! 

With his newfound ability, can Noda save the failing school from ruin?
description.ja:
冴えない国語教師「野田誠」は、生徒たちに馬鹿にされながらも、学級崩壊した教室で担任を続けていた。ある日、一つの誤解から体育教師のビンタを受け、運悪く机の角に頭をぶつけて意識を失ってしまう。

しかし、目を覚ますと目の前に謎のウィンドウが。そこに表示されたクエストを攻略すると、現実のステータスも上がり、特殊アイテムも手に入る…！？ 

手に入れた能力で、「野田」は崩壊した学園を「救済」できるのかー！？

altTitles.ja: 甘えさせて雛森さん！

description.en:
Suou Yaya is admired by the whole school. Perfect grades, beautiful, an exemplary girl overall worthy of the praise she receives. From afar, her childish underclassman Hinamori Ichigo yearns to be like her...

...That is, until she finds her beloved Suou-senpai is a LOT more childish than her, and wants to be spoiled rotten, lest she'll throw a tantrum.
description.pt-br:
Suou Yaya é admirada por toda escola. Notas perfeitas, linda, uma garota exemplar no geral digna dos elogios que recebe. De longe, sua caloura infantil Hinamori Ichigo deseja ser como ela...

...Isto é, até que ela descubra que sua amado Suou-senpai é MUITO mais infantil do que ela, e quer ser mimada, para que ela não faça birra.

altTitles.ja: グリーンボックス

description.en: Sena, a high school boy, wakes up in an empty green room. In front of him was a world map and a one-line explanation. “Think of what you want and press the button for the country you want to destroy. You will be released if you win.'' Sena, who is gradually cornered, finally presses the button. Will it be Sena or humanity that will survive in the end?

altTitles.ja: しかるねこ

description.en:
Will it scold you with affection!?
The cutest cat manga right now!

Have you been scolded seriously lately?
Even while being scolded, it's very comforting.
Because it always kindly watches over you.

<https://twitter.com/shikaruneko>
description.ja:
最近、本気でしかられたこと、ありますか？

しかられているのに、とっても癒やされる。
それはいつもそばで優しく見守ってくれるから。
そんなしかるねこが初めて本になりました。

title.en: Doushitara Osananajimi ♀️ no Kanojo ni Naremasu Ka!?

altTitles.ja: どうしたら幼馴染♀の彼女になれますか！？

altTitles.en: How Do I Get Together With My Childhood Friend?

altTitles.id: Gimana Caranya Agar Aku Bisa Jadi Pacarnya Teman Masa Kecil ♀ Ku?

altTitles.en: How Do I Turn My Best Friend Into My Girlfriend?

altTitles.ko: 어떻게 해야 소꿉친구의 여친이 될 수 있나요?!

altTitles.zh: 怎样才能成为发小的女友呢！？

description.en: High schoolers Minami Ikoma and Yuzu Makita have been childhood friends since grade school. Since their parents are friends, they have always been together. However, as Minami sees her friend get confessed to, feelings in her own heart start to sprout. A romantic comedy of two childhood friend starts.
description.id: Siswa sekolah menengah Minami Ikoma dan Yuzu Makita telah menjadi teman masa kecil sejak sekolah dasar. Karena orang tua mereka berteman, mereka selalu bersama. Namun, saat Minami melihat temannya ditembak, perasaan di hatinya sendiri mulai tumbuh. Sebuah komedi romantis dari dua teman masa kecil dimulai.

description.en:
The first-generation hunter and the hero who established all monster subjugation systems and frameworks, Kim Jun-woo, finally defeats Gigantiana in the subjugation of the Black Grave Dungeon. However, he also loses his life in the process.

As his breath fades, he hears the voice of Gigantiana...

title.en: 6-nin no Shinanai Shoujo to Kanarazu Shinu Unmei no Hito

altTitles.ja: 6人の死なない少女と必ず死ぬ運命の人

altTitles.en: 6 Immortal Girls and The Man Destined to Die

description.en:
"I prayed to a god to have a girlfriend, and now I have to die and restart over and over again!?"

Follow the guy who is destined to die among the six heroines!
description.ja: 「彼女が欲しい」と神に願ったら何度も死んでやり直すことに!?６人のヒロインの中から必ず死ぬ運命の人を探し出せ！

altTitles.ja: シノニム

description.en: The manga centers on Yano, a virgin boy who dreams of success as an erotic manga artist. One day, he encounters a totally naked palm-sized girl.
description.ja: エロ漫画家として成功を夢みる専門学生・矢野。彼の前に突然、手のひらサイズの美少女が現れる。漫画賞を目指したいのに、俺の弁当に何かいるんです！

title.en: Namaiki na Gal Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 生意気なギャル姉を解らせる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Namaiki na Gyaru Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of Making My Cheeky Gal Sister Understand
The Story of Making My Cheeky Gyaru Sister Understand

altTitles.es-la: El día que decidí hacer entender a mi descarada hermana gal a mi manera

description.en: Every time she opens her mouth, it's nothing but abusive language, and her problematic behavior never stops. The protagonist has had enough and sets a “plan” into motion…??!
description.ja: 口を開けば暴言ばかりで、問題行動が絶えない姉。 彼女に痺れを切らし、主人公が踏み出した“計画”とは---??!
description.es-la:
Su hermana siempre dice cosas hirientes y cuyos comportamientos problemáticos nunca cesan, el protagonista, cansado de ella, da un paso adelante con un "plan"
¿Cuál será...?

title.en: Hazure Hantei kara Hajimatta Cheat Majutsushi Seikatsu

altTitles.ja: ハズレ判定から始まったチート魔術士生活

altTitles.zh: 从废柴判定开始的魔术士人生

altTitles.en: Life as a Cheat Magician that began with a False Judgment

description.en:
One day, all the eighth grade students were transferred to another world.

The princess of the other world summoned them to make up for their lack of strength. The students are threatened and decide to follow the princess, and they are made to take a magical power test to determine their abilities. While everyone is sorted according to their results, Kokubun Kento's result is a flop.

Judged as useless, he is expelled. However, there is actually a tremendous ability lurking within Kento... 

The life-size eighth grader Kento, together with his fellow skeletons, aims to rescue his classmates!

---

[web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5782dy/) (jp)
description.ja:
ある日、中学２年生の生徒全員が異世界に転移させられた。

異世界の王女が、戦力不足を補うために彼らを召喚したのだ。脅されて王女に従うことにした生徒たちは、能力を調べる魔力判定を受けさせられる。みんなが結果に応じて振り分けられていくなか、国分健人の判定結果はハズレ。

使い物にならないと判断されて、追放されてしまった。だが、健人の内には実は物凄い能力が潜んでいて… 

等身大の中学２年生の健人が、仲間になったスケルトンとともに同級生たちの救出を目指す！

title.en: Blue Archive - Kankan's Blue Archive Logs (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: 透き通る世界

description.en: A collection of Blue Archive short comics by artist ポテトルス on pixiv.

title.en: Net no "Oshi" to Real no "Oshi" ga Tonari ni Hikkoshite Kita

altTitles.ja: ネットの『推し』とリアルの『推し』が隣に引っ越してきた

altTitles.en: My Fave Persons Moved into Condominium Where I Live

description.en:
**The only one who can support them is... me?**

Tendou Souma, who spends his days in idle monotony, has two "idols." His online idol is Henrietta, a hugely popular VTuber. His real-life idol is Hiyori Yatsumi, an idol and voice actress. Souma's university life was supposed to be centered around supporting these two idols... But then, one of his idols unexpectedly moves into the room next door!? Excited by this dream-like turn of events, Soma is thrilled, but what he discovers is the disappointing true nature of his idol...
description.ja: 無為な日々を過ごす天童蒼馬には二人の『推し』がいる。ネットの『推し』大人気VTuberのアンリエッタ。リアルの『推し』アイドル声優の八住ひより。二人への推し活を生きがいに大学生活を送るはずが……なんと隣の部屋に『推し』の一人が引っ越してきて!?夢のような展開に胸を躍らせる蒼馬だったが、目の当たりにしたのは残念すぎる『推し』の本性で――。
description.vi: Vtuber nhà rác... Seiyuu Idol bợm rượu... Bạn thuở nhỏ Yandere... Ai sẽ là người chiến thắng

altTitles.en: Arifureta: From Commonplace to World's Strongest

altTitles.th: อาชีพกระจอกแล้วทำไม ยังไงข้าก็เทพ

altTitles.ja: ありふれた職業で世界最強

altTitles.zh: 平凡职业成就世界最强

altTitles.es-la: El más fuerte del mundo en una profesión mundana

altTitles.vi: Arifureta - Từ tầm thường đến bất khả chiến bại

altTitles.de: Arifureta - Der Kampf zurück in meine Welt

description.en:
Among the class transported to another world, Nagumo Hajime is an ordinary male student who didn’t have ambition nor aspiration in life, and thus called “Incompetent” by his classmates.
The class was summoned to become heroes and save a country from destruction. Students of the class were blessed with cheat specifications and cool job class, however, it was not the case with Hajime, with his profession as a “Synergist”, and his very mediocre stats. “Synergist”, to put it in another word was just artisan class. Being the weakest, he then falls to the depth of the abyss when he and his classmates were exploring a dungeon. What did he find in the depth of the abyss, and can he survive?


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/s/arifureta-from-commonplace-to-world-s-strongest)
description.fr:
Le quotidien de l’étudiant ordinaire qu’est Hajime Nagumo, dont la vie ne se comporte que de nuits blanches et siestes en cours, se retrouve bouleversé lorsque sa classe et lui se retrouvent transportés en tant qu’héros dans un autre monde afin de le sauver… Alors que tout le monde obtient des jobs assez puissants, notre héros se retrouve avec le job « Synergiste », assez inutile en l’état des choses, humilié et jeté seul dans les tréfonds d’un donjon, arrivera-t-il à survivre ?


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/s/arifureta-from-commonplace-to-world-s-strongest)
description.it:
Tra gli studenti trasportati in un altro mondo, Nagumo Hajime è uno studente senza ambizioni ed aspirazioni nella vita, è infatti soprannominato l’Incapace dai suoi compagni.
Gli studenti sono stati evocati per ergersi ad eroi e salvare il paese dalla distruzione. A loro sono stati donati poteri e classi di livello, a tutti tranne che a Nagumo Hajime, che inizia da Sinergista con statistiche mediocri.
Il Sinergista, è in altre parole un “crafter”. Essendo il più debole, finisce per cadere nelle profondità di un abisso durante l'esplorazione di un sotterraneo. 
Cosa troverà nelle profondità dell’abisso... e riuscirà a sopravvivere?
description.ja: 『趣味の合間に人生』を座右の銘としている南雲ハジメは、突然クラスメイトと共に異世界に召喚されてしまう。現地人とは比べ物にならない能力を皆が発現させる中、ハジメが発現させたのは、ごくありふれた能力である"錬成師"だった……。
description.pl:
Wśród uczniów klasy przeniesionej do innego świata, Hajime Nagumo niczym się nie wyróżnia; ot najzwyklejszy w świecie uczeń niemający ambicji czy życiowego celu, dlatego też nazywany w klasie "Nieudacznikiem".
Gdy cała klasa trafiła do innego świata, by zostać bohaterami i ocalić cały kraj przed zniszczeniem, wszyscy zostali pobłogosławieni oszukańczymi statystykami i świetnymi profesjami… za wyjątkiem Hajime, który skończył z profesją "Synergetyka" i przeciętnymi statystykami. "Synergetyk", ujmując to inaczej, jest zwyczajną klasą rzemieślniczą. Będąc najsłabszym w klasie, spada w głąb otchłani podczas wspólnego eksplorowania lochu. Czego dowiedział się w jej czeluściach i czy uda mu się przetrwać?


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/s/arifureta-from-commonplace-to-world-s-strongest)
description.ru:
Хадзимэ Нагумо, живущий по принципу «Первым делом - хобби», и весь его класс вдруг призывают в другой мир. Одноклассники один за другим открывают невероятные по меркам этого мира способности, ну а Хадзимэ достается бесполезный ремесленный класс «Синергист». Оказавшись в самых глубинах преисподней, он находит применения своему заурядному таланту и стремится найти выход из лабиринта…  


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/s/arifureta-from-commonplace-to-world-s-strongest)
description.es-la:
Entre la clase transportada a otro mundo, Nagumo Hajime es un estudiante normal y corriente que no tiene ambiciones ni aspiraciones en la vida, por lo que sus compañeros le llaman "Incompetente".
La clase fue convocada para convertirse en héroes y salvar a un país de la destrucción. Los estudiantes de la clase fueron bendecidos con habilidades tramposas y una categoría de trabajo genial, sin embargo, no fue el caso de Hajime, con su profesión de "Sinergista", y sus estadísticas muy mediocres. "Sinergista", para decirlo en otra palabra era simplemente la clase artesanal. Siendo el más débil, entonces cae a la profundidad del abismo cuando él y sus compañeros estaban explorando una mazmorra. ¿Qué encontró en la profundidad del abismo, y podrá sobrevivir?
description.pt-br: Entre a turma transportada para outro mundo, Nagumo Hajime é um estudante do sexo masculino comum que não tem ambição nem aspiração na vida, e, portanto, chamado de " incompetente" por seus colegas. A classe foi convocada para se tornar heróis e salvar um país da destruição. Os alunos da classe foram abençoados com as especificações de trapaça e classes legais, no entanto, não foi o caso com Hajime , com a sua profissão como um " Synergist " , e suas estatísticas muito medíocres. "Synergist", para colocá-lo em outras palavrsa era apenas a classe dos artesãos. Sendo o mais fraco , então ele cai para a profundidade do abismo , quando ele e seus colegas estavam explorando uma dungeon. O que ele encontra na profundidade do abismo, e ele pode sobreviver?

description.en:
In a world where prehispanic cultures developed an steam powered industrial technology, a young redheaded girl — the huntress Metzli — is tracking an interesting bounty. Maybe this commission is bigger than she expects. 

"It's like The Witcher but in Mexico" - a random guy, probably
description.es-la:
Sigue las aventuras de Metzli, una cazadora de monstruos tratando de ganar el pan del día a día para ella y sus hermanos. 

“Es como si the Witcher ocurriera en Mexico” – Un weon, probablemente

description.en:
Two childhood friends—Black, an emotional fashion designer with selective amnesia, and White, a rational writer who’s been absent for two years—reunite to confront their traumatic pasts and navigate the fragile space between heart and mind as they struggle to preserve their friendship on the brink of adulthood.
Grey is... is a deeply emotional coming-of-age series about the messy journey of self-discovery, about friendship, and about the delicate balance between emotion and reason.

altTitles.ja: 全部君のせいだ

description.en: Shiho is a troublesome otaku who wants to be a perfect cosplayer, and Yogi is a popular cosplayer with over 200,000 followers. The two uneven characters clash with each other as they aim to become super famous cosplayers!
description.ja: 漫画とコスプレをこよなく愛する主人公・隈井志保は、大学にて男性に絡まれている女性を助ける。その女性は、フォロワー20万人超えの有名レイヤー・夜伽であり、その流れで一緒にコスプレイベントに出演する。 気の合う友達を見つけたと思ったが、夜伽は志保が最も嫌う露出レイヤーであった…。 厄介オタクと露出レイヤー、凸凹な2人の行く末は…!?
description.es-la: La protagonista, Shiho Kumai, ama profundamente el manga y el cosplay. En la universidad, salva a una chica que es acosada por unos chicos. Resulta ser que Yotogi, es una famosa cosplayer con más de 200,000 seguidores. Juntas participan en un evento de cosplay. Aunque parecen haber encontrado una amistad afín, Shiho descubre que Yotogi es una cosplayer exhibicionista que tanto detesta… ¿Cómo será el destino de estas dos amigas con personalidades tan diferentes, una otaku problemática y una cosplayer exhibicionista?

altTitles.ja: ちるらん 新撰組鎮魂歌【レクイエム】

description.en: In 1912, a young woman tracks down the elderly Nagakura Shinpachi, determined to hear the true story of the Demon of the Shinsengumi, the Vice Commander Hijikata Toshizou. Hijikata's story begins in 1859, when he is a violent young man that is honing his sword skills while peddling his family's medicine. Soon, in his quest to find stronger people to fight, Hijikata starts to come into contact with others who will eventually become his comrades in the Shinsengumi. The first one to make an impression on the brash young man is Kondo Isami, who proves to be a better fighter than Hijikata.
description.pt-br: Em 1912, uma jovem mulher rastreia o idoso Nagakura Shinpachi, determinada a ouvir a verdadeira história do Demônio do Shinsengumi, o Vice-Comandante Hijikata Toshizou. A história de Hijikata começa em 1859, quando ele é um jovem violento que está aprimorando suas habilidades com a espada enquanto vende os remédios de sua família. Logo, em sua busca para encontrar pessoas mais fortes para lutar, Hijikata começa a entrar em contato com outros que eventualmente se tornarão seus companheiros no Shinsengumi. O primeiro a causar uma impressão no jovem impetuoso é Kondo Isami, que prova ser um lutador melhor do que Hijikata.

altTitles.ja: モブから始まる探索英雄譚

altTitles.zh-hk: 從路人開始的探索英雄譚

altTitles.zh: 从路人开始的探索英雄谭

altTitles.en: The Story of an Exploration Hero Who Has Worked His Way up From Common People

description.en:
Takagi Kaito, a low status high schooler, your typical mob character so to say, was just a normal everyday explorer who hunted slimes every day in the dungeons that appeared in Japan, earning pocket money while admiring his childhood friend, the class queen, from afar. 

One day, a golden slime he had never seen appears before him. After he defeats it, he obtains an extremely rare item worth hundreds of millions as a drop, a servant card that can summon mythical beings!! After he makes up his mind and summons it, a warrior maiden with unparalleled beauty appears. 

Rise above being just a mob explorer Kaito! A modern battle fantasy story has begun!

---
**Links:**
- [Web Novel (JP)](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8930fk/) 
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/55183)
description.ja: ＜ダンジョン＞にソロで潜り、スライム狩りの毎日を送る男子高校生・高木海斗。そんなある日、変なスライムから時価10億の<サーバントカード>を手に入れる。悩み抜いた末に召喚を選択した海斗のもとに現れたのは神話の戦乙女ヴァルキリーの格好をした幼女シルフィーだった。一度は落胆したものの、シルフィーが最強クラスのスキルを持っている事が判明し…!? モブな探索者から成り上がれ!
description.pt-br: Takagi Kaito, um colegial de baixa estatura, o típico personagem Mob, era um explorador comum que caçava slimes todos os dias nas masmorras que surgiram no Japão, ganhando dinheiro extra enquanto admirava sua amiga de infância, a madona da classe. Um belo dia, um slime dourado que ele nunca tinha visto antes aparece para ele. Depois de derrotá-lo, ele obtém um item extremamente raro no valor de centenas de milhões, uma carta de Servo que pode convocar seres lendários!! Depois que ele se decide, ele a convoca, e uma donzela guerreira extremamente linda aparece. Supere sua posição como um simples Mob, Kaito! Uma nova fantasia moderna começa!

altTitles.ja: バニー先生

description.en: Previously post as chapters (Ch 1-8) of **[Imo Ichirou's Twitter Shorts](https://mangadex.org/title/2242193d-8634-4a74-8bfa-45744e53866f/imo-ichirou-s-twitter-shorts)**

Baili Jin, a fairy who was living in heaven, eating and drinking without a care, broke her Majesty’s colourful, stained-glass plate at her birthday and got banished to the mortal realm. Now she has to begin her adventures in the mortal realm with all of her spiritual powers gone! In order to survive, the former fairy has to deliver take-out….  
  
An endearingly silly fairy, a gentle restaurant manager, a reserved top student and a hard to resist yandere onee-san (kind on the outside, dark/possessive on the inside) , let the story of their beautiful friendship and youthful days begin!  
  
Author's weibo: [@Viva喂娃酱](https://weibo.com/vivaandjulys)   
Artist's weibo: [@Julys橘奶司](https://weibo.com/julys0723)
description.pt-br: Bai Lijin, uma fada que vivia no céu, comendo e bebendo sem se preocupar, quebrou o colorido vitral de Sua Majestade em seu aniversário e foi banida para o reino mortal. Agora ela tem que começar suas aventuras no reino mortal sem todos os seus poderes espirituais! Para sobreviver, a ex-fada tem que entregar comida… Uma fada carinhosamente boba, uma gentil gerente de restaurante, uma aluna reservada e uma garota de duas caras difícil de resistir, que comece a história de sua bela amizade e juventude!

altTitles.ja: 離れてください、冥仙さん

description.en:
In a society where people with monster dominate, high school student Makoto Tatara has a friend in this unusual world. Her name is Toko Meisen.

Having a beautiful girl as a friend might make any guy envious... but there’s a twist—she is a ghost, a spirit-like existence! Their bond is one of "Soul-mates" (friends who share life energy).

To make things even more chaotic, her sense of personal boundaries is completely broken, leading her to naturally do some rather suggestive things! Can Tatara maintain his friendship with Meisen, or will things take an unexpected turn?

Note: Depending on audience feedback, this might turn into a full series!
description.ja:
幽鬼のあの娘はボクと××する仲です。

モンスターの血を引く人種が跋扈する社会、そんな世界で高校生をやっている多々良慎（たたらまこと）には、友達がいた。その娘の名前は冥仙透子（めいせんとうこ）。
可憐な女の子と友達で男なら羨ましい…と思える状況だったが、彼女はなんと幽霊のような存在な幽鬼族！ 精気を与える友達「魂トモ」関係だったのだ。
しかも、距離感がバグっている彼女はナチュラルにエッチなこともし…

title.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 9 - The JOJOLands

altTitles.ja-ro: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken Part 9 -  The JoJoLands

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 Part9 The JOJOLands

altTitles.es-la: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Parte 9 - Las JOJOLandias

altTitles.pl: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Część 9 - The JoJoLands

altTitles.fr: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Partie 9 - The JOJOLands

altTitles.pt-br: A Estranha Aventura de JoJo, Parte 9: As JoJoLândias

altTitles.it: Le Bizzarre Avventure di JoJo: Le JOJOLands

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 第9部 ザ・ジョジョランズ

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. 

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
description.hu:
Ez a Jojo's Bizarre Adventure kilencedik történetíve.

O'ahu, napjainkban. Dua Lipa a trendi előadó és a COVID még mindig a fő gond. Ezen a szigeten él egy 15 éves srác, Jodio Joestar. Bátyával és édesanyjával él, dílerként dolgozik és bizonyos illegális anyagokat árul. Egy nap, a főnöke mutat neki egy kiválló fogást: egy japán személy Hawaiira érkezett egy hat millió dollárt érő gyémánttal. Normális esetben lehetetlen lenne ellopni, de akinek standje van...

Ez egy fiatal fiú és az ő küldetésének a története, hogy gazdag legyen.
description.it: O'ahu, oggi. Dua Lipa è la musicista di tendenza e il COVID è ancora una delle principali preoccupazioni. Su quest'isola vive un ragazzo di 15 anni di nome Jodio Joestar. Vive con il fratello e la madre e fa lo spacciatore di alcune sostanze illegali. Un giorno, il suo datore di lavoro arriva e gli mostra un'eccellente scoperta: un giapponese è sbarcato alle Hawaii con un diamante del valore di oltre sei milioni di dollari. Normalmente sarebbe impossibile da rubare, ma per qualcuno con una posizione... Questa è la storia di un ragazzo e della sua ricerca della ricchezza.
description.uk:
Дев’ята сюжетна арка «Неймовірних пригод Джоджо». Оаху, теперішній час. Дуа Ліпа – популярна музикантка, а COVID-19 досі викликає серйозне занепокоєння. На цьому острові мешкає 15-річний хлопчик на ім'я Джодіо Джостар. Живе з братом і матір'ю, торгує певними забороненими речовинами. Одного разу його бос прийшов до нього і показав неймовірну знахідку: японець висадився на Гаваях з діамантом вартістю понад шість мільйонів доларів! Зазвичай, вкрасти таку коштовність було б неможливо, але для того, хто має стенд… 
Це історія про молодого хлопця та його прагнення розбагатіти.
description.es-la: Cierto japonés ingresó a la isla de Hawái con un diamante de valor de 6 millones de dólares. En la isla de Oahu vive un chico llamado Jodio Joestar, cuya meta es arrebatar el diamante de las manos de esa persona. Junto a sus asociados, irán a la quinta de esa persona. Sin embargo, ¿Qué misterios les esperan?

title.en: Yumizuka Iroha wa Tejun ga Daiji!

altTitles.en: Technique Is Everything to Yumizuka Iroha!
The Process Is Important for Iroha Yumizuka
Yumizuka Iroha's No Good Without Her Procedure!

altTitles.ja: 弓塚いろはは手順が大事！

altTitles.zh: 弓塚同学今天也依旧脱靶

description.en: Yumizuka-san grew up as the daughter of one of Japan's leading families of archery. But she had a secret about her seemingly perfect life! A tempestuous romantic comedy about a captivating archer!
